member.summary: Used for Manufacturing Development

member.name: M:PX.Objects.AM.AMDebug.MeasureElapsed``1(System.Func{``0},System.String)
member.summary: Run a process and measure its processing time
member.example: var x = AMDebug.MeasureElapsed(() => GraphUIDEquals(taskInfo.NativeKey, UID), "GraphUIDEquals"); var y = AMDebug.MeasureElapsed(() => taskInfo.NativeKey == UID);

member.name: M:PX.Objects.AM.AMDebug.MeasureElapsedTicks``1(System.Func{``0},System.String)
member.summary: Run a process and measure its processing ticks
member.example: var x = AMDebug.MeasureElapsedTicks(() => GraphUIDEquals(taskInfo.NativeKey, UID), "GraphUIDEquals"); var y = AMDebug.MeasureElapsedTicks(() => taskInfo.NativeKey == UID);

member.name: T:PX.Objects.AM.Attributes.AMDBCurrencyBaseAttribute
member.summary: Reverse the logic to allow the base cury values to contain the entered/formula values with the cury fields being calculated. The standard PXDBCurrencyAttribute assumse cury is the field being entered/formula and the base is calculated. (Blend/copy of PXDBCurrencyAttribute and PXCurrencyHelper - 5.30.1128)

member.name: P:PX.Objects.AM.Attributes.AMDBCurrencyBaseAttribute.RecalculateCondition
member.summary:
Accepts an IBqlWhere/IBqlUnary predicate that is used to decide whether to recalculate the field this attribute is attached to when is updated. If this is not set, then it will not recalculate.
IBqlCreator.

member.name: M:PX.Objects.AM.Attributes.AMDBCurrencyBaseAttribute.#ctor(System.Type,System.Type)
member.summary: Constructor
member.param: Field in this table used as a key for CurrencyInfo table. If 'null' is passed then the constructor will try to find field in this table named 'CuryInfoID'.
Field in this table to store the result of currency conversion. If 'null' is passed then the constructor will try to find field in this table name of which start with 'base'.

member.name: M:PX.Objects.AM.Attributes.AMVendorShipmentContactAttribute.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Ctor. Internaly, it expects POShipContact as a POContact type
member.param:
Must have type IBqlSelect. This select is used for both selecting
a source Contact record from which PO Contact is defaulted and for selecting version of POContact,
created from source Contact (having matching ContactID, revision and IsDefaultContact = true).
- so it must include both records. See example above.

member.name: M:PX.Objects.AM.Attributes.AMVendorShipmentAddressAttribute.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Internaly, it expects POShipAddress as a POAddress type.
member.param:
Must have type IBqlSelect. This select is used for both selecting
a source Address record from which PO address is defaulted and for selecting default version of POAddress,
created from source Address (having matching ContactID, revision and IsDefaultContact = true)
if it exists - so it must include both records. See example above.

member.name: P:PX.Objects.AM.AddTreeNodeParams.ExtraColumns
member.summary: A single field is used to return all extra column values for the given tree node. Set value based on in JSON-stringify-friendly format. Example: if returning 2 extra fields of string and bool we would return as such: $"[\"1.00\", \"EA\"]" In the page we have the ExtraColumnField identified by setting ExtraColumnField="ExtraColumns" and then also the type definition on the PXTree as the following: ExtraColumns='[{"tagname": "qp-text-editor", "title": "Nums", "width": 50}, {"tagname": "qp-check-box", "title": "Chs", "width": 50}]'

Unable to determine if we can receive the base delegate for chained extensions (Ex: PXRowSelected del). member.summary: Override the BOM ID of an Inventory ID for any given BOM ID level (item/warehouse/subitem)

Should we override the current bom ID at the Warehouse level. If false the BOM ID is set at this level if one does not exist

Should we override the current bom ID at the Item level. If false the BOM ID is set at this level if one does not exist
Should we override the current bom ID at the Warehouse level. If false the BOM ID is set at this level if one does not exist
Should we override the current bom ID at the SubItem level. If false the BOM ID is set at this level if one does not exist. Only valid with the Subitem feature enabled
